## IImageData interface

A cross-environment interface for image data objects that covers the properties supported by both DOM (as ImageData) and canvas-cleave (as NodeImageData).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IImageData 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./canvas-cleave.iimagedata.data.md) | <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code> | The actual RGB32 image data. The length of the data is width \* height \* 4 (bytes per pixel). |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.iimagedata.height.md) | <code>number</code> | The height of the image data in pixels. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.iimagedata.width.md) | <code>number</code> | The width of the image data in pixels. |
